title: Absolute Shot in the Dark Trade +++ Sov.s
author: mybuddyinc

posts.post_title: Absolute Shot in the Dark Trade +++ Sov.s
posts.post_content:
This falls in the "don't ask, never know" catagory:

I have all of the following “portraits” with Sov.350 backs.  

Bridwell/no cap, Criger, Doughtery, Lajoie, Mathewson, Parent, Stone, Turner, Waddell, Wiltse/no cap, Young.

All are pretty nice cards, and quite tough (I've attached two to give idea of general condition).  However, I LOVE my portraits as Sov.150s.  So, if anyone has a Sov.150, and would like to TRADE * for my corresponding 350, let me know.  I can take a slight condition drop or even add some $$$.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=315064&d=1525718914[/IMG]

* Just to reiterate:  These are ONLY for TRADE --- NOT for Sale.

[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks, Scott
